description.value:
Activate 1 (manipulate)

This potent poison consists of crystals whose flavor and appearance mimics edible salt but whose effects are deadly; victims experience periods of waking nightmares that overload the senses and eventually result in death through a combination of shock and exhaustion.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:43]

Onset 1 hour; Maximum Duration 5 days

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} once every [[/gmr 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 hours}, plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued] (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused] for 1 minute once every [[/gmr 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 hours}, plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3} and fatigued (1 day)

Stage 3 frightened 3, plus confused for [[/gmr 1d4 #minutes]]{1d4 minutes}, once every hour, plus fatigued (1 day)

Stage 4 death
